pages.title: Vein Mining
pages.text: Hold $(bold)`(~)$() to enable $(key)Vein Mining$(). This key is usually located in the top-left of the keyboard, above Tab, below Esc, and to the left of 1.$(br2)By default, each $(key)Vein Mining$() action only breaks a few blocks. You can increase the range by enchanting your tools with $(bold)Vein Mining$().
